short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy data generator that fills the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Exposes a few buttons that generate data and save it to the user's clipboard.

Useful when random IPs, random CIDRs, random MAC addresses or current timestamp or date and time are needed.
